name: Totem Climber
description:
A Spinning Platformer Pluzzle where the player needs to climb a totem to beat each level.

Controls:

WASD /arrow keys -> Walk

Space - > Jump

(you can probably play this game using a controller too, haven't tried though)

Totem Climber was made during the first Unity Course Community Game Jam by me alone in the course of one week (although the total jam time was two weeks).

Unity Assets used:
Forest Environment : Hand Painted Forest Environment;

SkyBox: Toony Skies;

Post Processing: Post Processing Stack;

Most of the UI: Fantasy Wooden GUI : Free;
